ComicInfo.Summary: Lights...Camera... Action! The cameras are rolling for the auditions of a new made-for-TV superhero team: WildGuard. Hundreds of superheroes will try out, but only five will have what it takes to make the team... if they survive! Join a host of heroes through the agony of competition and unforeseen dangers, as they hope to be selected by a panel of judges, including the mysterious Producer "X". Who will make the cut? You make the call! Log on to www.wildguard.com and cast your vote for the hero you want to make the team.Â Producer "X" and the WildGuard hopefuls come face-to-face with the menace behind the audition invasion. Will they be able to stop this maniac and rescue the captive try-out contenders? Also, which hero will not survive a run in with this villain?
ComicInfo.Title: Part Four: Somebody Save Me.
